name: The Clipper
description: The Clipper is a Rare Vladof repeater from the base game and the only gun that combines an elemental effect with a melee blade. Its incendiary effect procs often for x1 element, and the blade stuns, making it strong early on—especially against skags—despite average gun stats.

special.red: Don't drop it... might lose a toe.
special.description: Grants +100% melee damage with an incendiary element, plus faster reloads but lower damage and fire rate with wider spread and recoil.
